title: Full White
provenance_text:
Leon Polk Smith [1906-1996], New York, NY; Betty Parsons Gallery, New York, NY [1]; gift of the artist to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1962 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was included (no. 361, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by Betty Parsons Gallery.
[2]. See copy of correspondence with the artist, dated December 12, 1961, in curatorial file. The painting was accessioned on February 15, 1962.
